title: Amazing Tech Support Personnel
body: I just wanted to say I had the most wonderful experience today dealing with tech support and that a lot of times the people who help solve our tech issues go unrecognized. So I wanted to make a thread where we can give shoutouts to those people. I personally wanna thank Gruffalowdown for the amazing help I was given today in resolving my issue with the client shortcut.

replies.body: Thanks for the kind words!  I announced your accolade and we gave a solid applause for our pal Gruffalowdown.  Glad to hear all is well now!
